author: Reuters Editorial
title: Hungary Dec retail sales rise by 5.9 pct y/y -stats
text: BUDAPEST, Feb 5 (Reuters) - Hungary's calendar-adjusted retail sales rose by an annual 5.9 percent in December after a revised 6.7 percent in November, the Central Statistics Office (KSH) said on Monday. Food sales grew by 2.1 percent, non-food sales were up by 10.4 percent, while fuel sales rose by 4.1 percent. In 2017 as a whole, retail sales grew by 4.8 percent, the same as in 2016. Dec 2017 Nov 2017 Dec 2016 FY 2017 FY 2016 5.9 6.7 3.7 4.8 4.8 (Reporting by Marton Dunai)
